job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a desire to connect technical work with broader societal impact and purpose, aligning with understanding the business context.

job_tasks.justification: Highlights the company's mission and market position, requiring understanding of business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Het opstellen van AI-governance frameworks waarmee organisaties verantwoord AI kunnen toepassen
job_tasks.justification: Involves understanding organizational needs and regulatory frameworks for AI implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Het onderhouden van contact met de klant, om ze zo goed van (technisch) advies te kunnen voorzien
job_tasks.justification: Directly relates to understanding client needs and providing advice, which is a core business understanding function.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bent in zowel het Nederlands als Engels mondeling en schriftelijk vaardig
job_tasks.justification: Essential for client communication and understanding business requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: het ontwerpen, bouwen en beheren van responsible AI-toepassingen

job_tasks.justification: Describes the end-to-end lifecycle of AI applications, from concept to production, which includes model development stages.

job_tasks.phrase: Het auditen van algoritmes, op o.a. bias
job_tasks.justification: Auditing algorithms, especially for bias, is a form of model evaluation and refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt ervaring met programmeren in Python en gerelateerde ML packages (bv. Pyspark, Tensorflow/Keras, pytorch, SKlearn)
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions programming languages and ML packages used for model development and implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt ervaring en affiniteit met Generative AI
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states experience with generative AI, a key aspect of modern modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Het inrichten, opzetten en implementeren van responsible AI-toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the implementation and deployment of AI applications, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt ervaring met databases, Git en DevOps
job_tasks.justification: Includes essential software development tools and practices like Git and DevOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt ervaring met het in productie brengen van ML-oplossingen in de cloud
job_tasks.justification: Concerns the deployment and integration of ML solutions into production environments, a key software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt ervaring en affiniteit met het Microsoft platform (i.e. Azure, AI Studio)
job_tasks.justification: Mentions cloud platforms and services used for building and deploying AI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt ervaring met databases, Git en DevOps
job_tasks.justification: DevOps is a core component of MLOps, focusing on the operationalization of AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt ervaring met het in productie brengen van ML-oplossingen in de cloud
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to productionizing ML solutions, a key MLOps responsibility.

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes designing, building, and managing responsible AI applications, including prototypes and integrated solutions. While traditional ML skills are present, the explicit mention of 'Generative AI' and the focus on responsible AI application development aligns well with the GenAI Engineer profile. The emphasis on user-facing applications and responsible AI practices further supports this classification.
